data.actual_result: The picture still goes through and you can save the changes just fine
data.expected_result: As the text says, it shouldn't accept icons under 128x128
data.short_description: The app says that the server icon is required to have a minimum size of 128x128, although it lets you upload images that don't respect this constraint
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Server Settings > Overview - Remove the server icon. Notice that the Remove button is replaced by a text "Minimum size: 128x128" when there is no icon - Pick a new server icon that is under 128x128 format
